tweet.text: Are you a current or recent grad student in the history of U.S. foreign relations with Africa? Apply to the Presidential Management Fellows Program for a chance to work on the #FRUS series. #PMF applications accepted until Oct. 12 https://t.co/9MdLicfclR https://t.co/bpfG0HnSl6
